data.decision: TemplateSpec uses YAML/JSON with 3 core components: VariableSpec (user inputs with type system), StepSpec (action-based pipeline steps), OutputSpec (artifact definitions). Variables use {{handlebars}} syntax. Step outputs referenced as step[N].output.
data.rationale: Simple, declarative format that's human-readable. Actions are verbs (generate, upscale) not backend-specific. Variable types map cleanly to UI controls. Step references enable multi-step pipelines.
